actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel of Senator Paula Hawkins and employees in the case of United States v. William M. Conover, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Paula Hawkins, or any Senate employees substituted for her, in connection with subpoenas in the case of United States v. William M. Conover, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel of Senator Paula Hawkins and employees in the case of United States v. William M. Conover, et al.
